constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 68 (Tuesday, April 26, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GREEN of Tennessee:
H.R. 7579.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H4511]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Foreign Affairs, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Western Hemisphere Nearshoring Act
